bundle.shortDescription: An open-source task management application that helps you organize your life across all your devices.
bundle.longDescription:
Faire ToDo - Your Simple, Open-Source To-Do List App

Organize your tasks effortlessly with Faire ToDo, a minimalist yet powerful to-do list app designed for productivity without the clutter. Whether you're managing daily chores, work projects, or personal goals, Faire ToDo helps you stay on track with a clean, intuitive interface—completely free and open-source!
Key Features:

✔ Simple & Lightweight - No unnecessary features, just a straightforward way to manage tasks.
✔ Open-Source & Privacy-Focused - Your data stays yours—no tracking, no ads, no subscriptions.
✔ Cross-Platform Sync - Access your tasks seamlessly across devices (Windows, macOS, Linux, Android, and more).
✔ Keyboard Shortcuts - Boost productivity with quick shortcuts for adding and managing tasks.
✔ Dark/Light Mode - Choose a theme that suits your preference.
✔ Local Storage (Offline-First) - Works without an internet connection, with optional cloud sync.
✔ Customizable & Extensible - Built with flexibility in mind, allowing for future integrations.
